bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part III. British Museum London.
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part III. British Museum London.
Olten - Lausanne, Urs Graf Verlag, 1963, in fol., xi-139 pp., ill.

C.R. par B. Bischoff, HZ 223 (1976) pp. 689-696 [concerne: Parts IV-V]. - S. Daris, Aegyptus 44 (1964) pp. 329-330. - M. Hombert, ChrEg 40 (1965) No. 80, pp. 528-532. - E.G. Turner, JRS 56 (1966) pp. 255-256.
